articles.title: QR code to be only form of proof of COVID-19 vaccine accepted in Alberta starting Monday - Global News
articles.description: Starting Monday, Albertans looking to enter businesses that have implemented the COVID-19 restrictions exemption program will need to use the QR code.

articles.title: Coronavirus in Quebec: 634 new cases, four more deaths, hospitalizations drop by nine - CTV News Montreal
articles.description: Quebec reported Sunday that 643 more people have tested positive for COVID-19, with 403 of those not fully vaccinated.
articles.content:
MONTREAL -- 
Quebec reported Sunday that 634 more people have tested positive for COVID-19, with 403 of those not fully vaccinated.

articles.title: Mixed reactions to new COVID-19 rules as Manitoba hits highest infection rate among provinces - CBC.ca
articles.description: Reactions have been mixed so far to Manitoba’s latest public health orders targeting kids in sports, hospital capacity and unvaccinated churchgoers in the southern part of the province.
articles.content:
